CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and so misses her chance, ending up all alone.

CONTENT: ただいま
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm home.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The girl who doesn't join any clubs, comes home right after school,

CONTENT: スマホに届くのは　親からのメッセージか クーポンのお知らせだけ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y en el celular solo veía mensajes de sus padres y cupones de descuento.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and finds her smartphone full of nothing but messages from her parents and coupon offers.

CONTENT: それが私
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's me.

CONTENT: 後藤ひとり 中学1年生
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me llamo Hitori Goto y estoy en primero de preparatoria.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hitori Goto, first-year in middle school.

CONTENT: たまーに思う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sometimes I think

CONTENT: このままで いいんだろうかって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: que debería cambiar mi forma de ser.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I should really change the way I am...

CONTENT: でも 私 話す前に "あっ"って言っちゃうし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But I always stammer when I try to speak,

CONTENT: 目 合わすのも苦手だし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and I'm really bad at keeping eye contact...

CONTENT: "THE 陰キャ"のような日々が 身の丈に合って...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La vida típica de introvertida es lo mío.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A life as the archetypal introvert just seems to fit me best.

CONTENT: これ見てる?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You watching this?

CONTENT: ううん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nah.

CONTENT: 学生のころは 教室の隅っこで　本読んでるふりしてるヤツでした
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En la escuela, yo era el que se sentaba al fondo y hacía como que leía.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Back in school, I was the guy who sat in the back of the classroom pretending to read.

CONTENT: 友達いなくて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No friends.

CONTENT: それが今では　若者に絶大な人気を誇る バンドになったと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y ahora eres parte de una banda muy famosa entre los jóvenes.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And now you're part of a band that's extremely popular with young people!

CONTENT: まあ バンドは陰キャでも輝けるんで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí. Los introvertidos podemos brillar en una banda.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah. A band is a place where even introverts can shine.

CONTENT: そうなんですねー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I see!

CONTENT: それでは お聴きください　インストームスで"引き金"
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now, here's "Trigger" by Instorms!

CONTENT: おっ どうした?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What is it?

CONTENT: お... お父さん ギター貸して
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: D-Dad, can I use your guitar?

CONTENT: えっ? いいよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sure!

CONTENT: あ... ありがとう!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Th-Thanks!

CONTENT: そうか ひとりも ついにギターに興味を
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya veo. Por fin se interesa por la guitarra.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Aha! At last, Hitori's getting into guitar too!

CONTENT: バンド組んだら　私みたいな人間でも もしかしたら 輝ける?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si estuviera en una banda, ¿incluso alguien como yo podría brillar?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Maybe even someone like me can shine if I'm in a band!

CONTENT: 決めた! ギターうまくなる!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I've made up my mind. I'm gonna learn to play guitar!

CONTENT: で 学校でバンド組んで...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Then I'll form a band at school, and...

CONTENT: なんで突然 英語?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What's with all the English?

CONTENT: それで 文化祭でライブして
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Además, tocaré en el festival cultural
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Then I'll play at the culture festival

CONTENT: みんなから ちやほやされるんだ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y volveré loco a todo el mundo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and have everyone go crazy for me!

CONTENT: ちや... ほや?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Crazy... for me?

CONTENT: 人様の前で演奏出来るように　毎日6時間練習を続けた結果...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ensayé seis horas al día para aprender a tocar delante de la gente... ¿El resultado?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I practiced six hours every day, so I could learn how to play in front of people... The result?

CONTENT: いつの間にか中学終わってた!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Acabó el año y nadie me escuchó.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Middle school ended, and I never played a single note for them!

CONTENT: ライブ出れなかった　文化祭!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I never performed once... At the culture festival!

CONTENT: 集められなかった　バンドメンバー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Nunca he reunido... -A miembros de una banda.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I never put together... The members for a band!

CONTENT: そもそも友達 一人もできなかった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Nunca me he hecho amiga de nadie...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And I never made a single friend...

CONTENT: 3年間!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: In three whole years!

CONTENT: 高校こそは...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now, in high school...

CONTENT: 高校になったら 絶対バンドやるんだぁ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Tengo que formar una banda aunque sea lo último que haga!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I gotta form a band or die trying!

CONTENT: と 決意した高校生活も 始まって早一ヵ月
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por mucho que lo dijera, ya hace un mes que empezaron las clases
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But despite my vow, it's been a whole month since high school started,

CONTENT: 心の拠り所はギターだけ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y mi corazón sigue pegado a la guitarra.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and yet my heart remains grounded in the guitar,

CONTENT: ひきこもり一歩手前ですぅー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: little better than a shut-in...

CONTENT: 作詞作曲 私 "押し入れより愛をこめて"
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La letra y la música son mías. Con amor desde el armario.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Lyrics and music by me. From the closet with love.

CONTENT: って 真夜中に 私のクソなオリジナル曲で　ご近所トラブル起こす前に

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But before I cause neighborhood problems playing my crummy original song late at night,

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I've gotta upload a cover I did of a popular band.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wow, my latest video already has so many comments.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and people are telling me I'm good...

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, maybe it's okay if I can't handle real life!

CONTENT: お客さんの目線も 耐えられるわけが...

CONTENT: 怖いなら これに入って演奏したら?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si tienes miedo, toca aquí adentro.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you're scared, you could play from in here.

CONTENT: いっ い... いつも弾いてる環境と同じですー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Se parece a donde toco siempre.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-It's the same environment that I play in all the time!

CONTENT: どんな所に住んでるの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Where exactly do you live?

CONTENT: 皆さん 下北 盛り上げていきましょう!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: How you feelin' tonight, Shimo-Kita?!

CONTENT: 少し気が大きくなった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's suddenly more outgoing.

CONTENT: そういえば ライブで なんて紹介すればいい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: By the way, how do you want us to introduce you?

CONTENT: ひとりちゃん? 本名でいいかな?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: "Hitori-chan"? Should we use your real name?

CONTENT: い... いや それは...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'd... I'd rather not...

CONTENT: じゃあ あだ名とかはないの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Any nicknames, then?

CONTENT: ちゅ... 中学では "あのー"とか"おい"とか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En la secundaria me llamaban "oye" y "tú"...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: In middle school, they called me "Hey" and "You there"...

CONTENT: それ あだ名じゃなくない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't think those are nicknames!

CONTENT: あああ... あだ名で呼び合うほど　親しい交友関係は 持ったことが...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Nunca he conocido a nadie tanto como para que me ponga apodos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I never knew anyone well enough to get nicknames from them!

CONTENT: ひとり... ひとりぼっち...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hitori... Hitoribocchi ...

CONTENT: ぼっちちゃんは?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: How about Bocchi-chan?

CONTENT: うっ またデリケートなところを
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tú y tu falta de tacto otra vez.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Another tactless comment!

CONTENT: ぼぼぼ... ぼっちです!　喜んでるし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm B-B-Bocchi! She likes it?

CONTENT: あだ名とか初めてで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's just my first ever nickname...

CONTENT: ううー なんか 涙出てきた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This is making me teary-eyed.

CONTENT: あっ まだ バンド名 聞いてなかったです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por cierto, no sé cómo se llama la banda.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, you haven't told me your band name yet.

CONTENT: 結束バンドだよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's Kessoku Band.

CONTENT: 結束バンド...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Kessoku Band...

CONTENT: 結束バンド?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Isn't that the word for "zip tie"?

CONTENT: プッ 傑作
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's brilliant.

CONTENT: 寒いし 絶対 変えるからー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's the worst pun! We're totally changing it!

CONTENT: なんで? かわいいよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why? It's cute.

CONTENT: あっ はい うああー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Y-Yes.

CONTENT: バンド名は後回しで そろそろ出番だよ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vamos, ya es hora de tocar.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Band name aside, it's time to play!

CONTENT: 大丈夫 あっ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't worry.

CONTENT: 下手でも 楽しく弾くことだけは 心掛けよう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Aunque no seas tan buena, la clave está en divertirte.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The key is to have fun, even if you suck!

CONTENT: 音って ものすごく 感情が表れやすいから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cuando tocas dejas ver lo que sientes.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Your feelings really come out in your playing, see?

CONTENT: は... はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: R-Right...

CONTENT: 技術を求めていくのは 次からで 全然いいよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya trabajaremos la técnica para la próxima vez.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We can always work on the skill part next time.

CONTENT: うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah.
Next... time...

CONTENT: よし 行こう! うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Okay, let's go! Right.

CONTENT: 私...　次も いていいんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They're okay with there being a next time!

CONTENT: はじめまして! 結束バンドでーす!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nice to meet you! We're Kessoku Band!

CONTENT: 今日は みんなも多分 知ってる曲を何曲か やるので　聴いてください!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Seguro que conocen nuestras canciones, así que disfruten!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We'll play a bunch of songs you probably know, so please enjoy!

CONTENT: )んだ? あれ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Who's that?

CONTENT: いつもの実力 出せなくて 最悪だけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Odio no poder tocar como de costumbre, pero...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I hate that I can't play as well as I usually do, but...

CONTENT: バンド組んで 誰かと演奏するのって　こんな楽しいんだ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Me está encantando tocar con más gente!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: playing in a band with other people is so much fun!

CONTENT: 私 今日 最高に輝いて...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I've never really shone before today...

CONTENT: ない!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And I still don't!

CONTENT: むしろ人生で 一番みじめかも!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Es lo más bajo que he caído hasta ahora!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This might actually be a low point for me!

CONTENT: ミスりまくったー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Boy, I screwed up!

CONTENT: MC スベってたね エヘッ　あっ あの! ん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Your intro bombed, too. E-Excuse me!

CONTENT: 何?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What?

CONTENT: つつ つつつ... 何? 怖いんだけど!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: B-B-B-B-B... Okay, you're freaking me out!

CONTENT: 次のライブまでには クラスメイトに　挨拶できるくらいには なっておきます!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Antes de la próxima, seré valiente y saludaré a mis compañeros de clase!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: B-Before our next performance, I'm gonna get brave enough to say hello to my classmates!

CONTENT: なんの宣言?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What a dramatic declaration.

CONTENT: 目覚ましい成長
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Such growth...

CONTENT: でも そっか... うん!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Okay, I get it. Sure!

CONTENT: よーし じゃあ今から　ぼっちちゃん歓迎会 兼 ライブの反省会だー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Celebraremos tu fiesta de bienvenida y funeral posconcierto!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Then let's have a Bocchi-chan-welcome-party- slash-concert-post-mortem!

CONTENT: あっ 今日は人と話し過ぎて 疲れたので帰りまーす
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya hablé demasiado hoy, así que me voy.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Actually, I'm pretty exhausted from all this social interaction, so I'm gonna go.

CONTENT: え? ごめん 眠い
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sorry. I'm sleepy.

CONTENT: しし... 失礼します!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: P-Pardon me!

CONTENT: 結束力 全然ないっ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡En esta banda no hay nada que nos una!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There's no "ties" in this band at all!

CONTENT: 絶対 コミュ症 治して
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm gonna get over my social anxiety

CONTENT: ギターヒーローの私としての 力を発揮するんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y sacaré toda mi fuerza de guitarhero.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and bring out my full guitarhero powers!

CONTENT: 虹夏ちゃん リョウさん 結束バンドのために!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Lo haré por Nijika, Ryo y Kessoku Band.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: For Nijika-chan, Ryo-san, and Kessoku Band!

CONTENT: すす... すいません! すいません!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: S-Sorry! Sorry!
